Entries.default: "Eothas was here, all right. And it looks like he headed to that lighthouse on the western end."
"Least he's easy to follow. Headed right for the lighthouse."
"Unless there's another colossus in the area, I think your green god made for the western lighthouse."
"I doubt anyone other than Eothas could have created that footprint. But look, the lighthouse is to the west."
"Our green friend walks with a heavy stride. Ekera, we should check on the lighthouse west of here."
"That's Gaun's footprint! And it looks like it's headed toward that lighthouse to the west."
"Eothas was here, check. Let's not hang around and wait for the other shoe to drop."
"Lest you be knowing another lad in need of boat-sized shoes, it be half likely that your green god stomped his way cross this backwater."
"With a footprint like this, one must wonder at the green god's other... ahem, dimensions."
"Would you look at the size of that footprint. Ain't no one can fill Gaun's shoes."
